timeline.message:
Inline @DataProvider

`@DataProvider` makes it harder to locate a failing test cases when
there are many test cases.

timeline.bodyText: Maybe put the 13 into a constant so that it's clear where it comes from, especially since it's used further down.
timeline.author: martint

replies.bodyText: hm... i will not do it. It's like this in every other test method in this class.
replies.author: findepi
